examples.example: 虽然前进的道路上充满了挑战，但我依然会坚定地走下去。

translate.english: Although the road ahead is full of challenges, I will still walk on firmly.

examples.example: 虽然生活中会遇到一些困难，但我们要始终保持乐观的心态去积极面对。

translate.english: Although there will be some difficulties in life, we should always keep an optimistic attitude to face them actively.

examples.example: 虽然今天下着雨，但丝毫没有影响大家游玩的兴致。

translate.english: Although it is raining today, it doesn't affect everyone's enthusiasm for playing at all.
